segments.text: Guess what , Gilly ? I won both bids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good for you . Did you use Paypal ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . It was so easy and super-fast , once I figured it out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the beauty of it , and the danger .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should get the items within a week . But in the meantime I'm bidding on a digital video camera .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thirty U . S . dollars ... and it's only been used for six months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm , sounds like risky business . Good luck .
segments.speaker: S2
